ygData.subject: Re: Shifting gears to thermal cloak...
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think the tattered cloak is the item you earn when you complete your initial guild quest.  Mostly because mine as a rogue was a tunic.  And a magic
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think the tattered cloak is the item you earn when you complete your
initial guild quest. Mostly because mine as a rogue was a tunic. And a
magic users' would be a robe.

One thought I had, which is probably way wrong, but who knows, I am also a
tailor and know that you can make reinforced leather itmes which involves
combining metal boning (rods) into the leather. Maybe the thermal cloak
recipe is more like 1. reinforced cloak, 1. firewater, and maybe 1. belt.
I've tried quite a few combinations of pw cloaks/belts/rods last night and
to no avail.

---

> From: GoodSmritn@...

> Just a heads up bud ,the tattered cloak is the item you earn when you
> complete the initial guild message errund and i think now the new pattern
for
> the cloak does allow for components to make the cloak more available. The
> recipie for thermal cloak is said to be this:
> 1 small tattered cloak
> 1 firewater (water and gnomish spirits)
> 1 metal rod
> 1 metal rod
> *should cost around 4pp each to make
> Sincerely Cloverleaf - Fennin Ro -Gnome Enchanter Extrordinare
